It is presently governed by Ibikunle Amosun and its capital is Abeokuta. The state consists of 20 local government areas including: * Abeokuta North * Abeokuta South * Ado-Odo/Ota * Ewekoro * Ifo * Ijebu East * Ijebu North * Ijebu North East * Ijebu Ode * Ikenne * Imeko Afon * Ipokia * Obafemi Owode * Odogbolu * Odeda * Ogun Waterside * Remo North * Sagamu (Shagamu) * Yewa North (formerly Egbado North) * Yewa South (formerly Egbado South) ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1970s establishments in Nigeria Category:1976 establishments in Africa
title: Ogun State
